description.raw:
This is a first version of VicinityPlugin.

Topic name, distance threshold and update rate can be configured from urdf/sdf.
Some things could be improved like memory management, getting the RobotNamespace from URDF instead of hard coding it, homogenize variables naming etc.. but as the other plugins don't do it so I think we can merge this as is and revisit later along the other plugins if we have time

* remove commented code, add distance detection and id publication

* readding collision actor plugin that disappeared during merge
